testcase.name: Validate the Login failure sceanrio
testcase.classname: This feature will validate the login scenrios for simplilearn.com
testcase.system-out: @Simplilearn @Ignore Scenario: Validate the Login failure sceanrio # src/test/java/features/SimplilearnLogin.feature:5 Given I have launched the application # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_have_launched_the_application() And I click on login link # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_click_on_login_link() When I enter username # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_enter_username() And I enter the password # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_enter_the_password() And I click on login button # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_click_on_login_button() Then I should get the error message as "The email or password you have entered is invalid." # stepdefs.LoginStepDefs.i_should_get_the_error_message_as(java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Validate different login options present on the login screen
